title: Introducing: ST.MARTiiNS
body:
Dundee outfit **ST.**

**MARTiiNS** have been around for a few years in various guises, having been in a band together since their early teens, and featuring on these pages before, but now it appears that they’ve reached their most coherent, fully realised sound so far. Their debut outing, _Bad Art_, seemingly draws from the likes of The 1975 and Two Door Cinema Club, in the frenetic guitar riff, and cutting, straight to the point songwriting. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
